title: Kedushat Levi
enDesc: One of the chasidic classics, reputedly endowed with special sanctity due to the famous righteousness of the author.
enShortDesc: Seminal work of Rabbi Levi Yitzchak of Berditchev arranged according to the weekly Torah portion.
heShortDesc: חיבור רב-השפעה של רבי לוי יצחק מברדיצ'ב, מאורגן על פי פרשת השבוע.
